subject: Password Expiration Reminder - Action Required
body:
Dear Alex Chen,

This is an automated reminder that your company password will expire in 3 days (August 4th, 2025).

To change your password:
1. Log into the company portal
2. Navigate to Account Settings
3. Select 'Change Password'
4. Follow the security requirements

Password Requirements:
- Minimum 12 characters
- Include uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and special characters
- Cannot reuse last 6 passwords

For assistance, contact IT Support at ext. 4455.

This is an automated message - please do not reply.
